DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to determine whether Asians who are especially sensitive to alcohol exposure can be protected by boosting their activities of an alcohol disposing enzyme. This will be accomplished by administering broccoli sprouts that are rich in an agent that increases protective enzyme activity. The test system involves applying alcohol patches to the skin and measuring skin redness.
DOC.criteria: 1870 years old, sensitive to alcohol on the skin, Japanese recent skin abnormalities /tanning
